effect.play: If 2 or more Barrens are at play, remove this card. Add a Wasteland and play it.
effect.damage: Transform a random Forest in play to Barrens

effect.play: P1 lose 3 health. P2 lose 3 health.
effect.damage: Increase player's health loss by 2 for the damaging player. If this card has a total of 10 damage or more, add and play an Earthquake.
effect.repair: Decrease health loss by 1 for the repairing player. If either value hits 0, becomes Barrens.

effect.play: [Disaster] All cards on the field are sent back to their corresponding decks.
